title: Border, 1972-42-75-a,b, 1805–25
description: a) A continuous repeating pattern of a daisy-like flower against a vertically striped background. Beneath this, there is a stylized floral band, and the bottom edging is dentilled; b) Upper dentils and a central striped background over with s-shaped foliate forms with floral centers alternate with dots. The bottom edging consists of a stylized floral/dot pattern above dentilling.
